info.description: This is a list of usable API services available from Archives Portal Europe. Here you can test these services, but to do so you need API key. Please register at APE server to get your API key.
info.title: Archives Portal Europe

get.summary: Return content response of an EAC-CPF item
Return content response of an EAD item

post.summary: Return the contents of the given valid clevel ids, maximum 1k ids are allowed

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Search EAD units
Maximum 1000 ids are allowed

get.summary: Download raw xml of an EAC-CPF item
Download raw xml of an EAD item

post.summary: Get all ancestors of a given id
Get all children of a given id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Search EAD units
Count should not be more than 50

post.summary: List of documents of the given type from the given Archival institute

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Search EAD units
Count should not be more than 50

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page request by count and startIndex

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Search EAC units
Count should not be more than 50

parameters.description:
Search EAD units

parameters.description:

id.description: Internal APE identifier of the result

country.description: Name of the country where the repository is. In English.

repositoryCode.description: Code of the repository holding the fonds. Preferably, but not necessarily ISIL

institutes.description: Array of search result, total number of elements can be less than query limit.

id.description: Internal APE identifier of the Descriptive Unit, Finding Aid, Holdings Guide or Source Guide. The same as your request parameter "id".

findingAidNo.description: Original identifier of the information provided by the repository.

unitTitle.description: Title of the information provided by the repository.

repositoryId.description: Internal APE identifier of the repository.

content.description: Information of C-level in EAD, serialized as JSON. This part could potentially contain all the elements that can be part of a Component-element (<c>) of an EAD/XML-document.

results.description: Array of search result, total number of elements can be less than query limit.

id.description: Internal APE identifier of the EAC-CPF. The same as your request parameter "id".

repositoryId.description: Internal APE identifier of the repository.

content.description: Information in EAD-format, serialized as JSON. This part could potentially contain all the elements that can be part of an EAD/XML-document.

content.description: Information in EAD-format, serialized as JSON. This part could potentially contain all the elements that can be part of an EAD/XML-document.

startIndex.description: Position from where this response set started.

totalPages.description: Total pages that can be generated based on query limit.

eacSearchResults.description: Array of search result, total number of elements can be less than query limit.

id.description: Internal APE identifier of the result

entityType.description: Type of the entity, (person, family or company)

repository.description: Name of the repository holding the eacCpfs

repositoryCode.description: Code of the repository holding the eacCpfs. Preferably, but not necessarily ISIL

country.description: Name of the country where the repository is. In English.

countryId.description: ID of the country where the repository is.

numberOfArchivalMaterialRelations.description: Number of record that has been created by current EAC

numberOfNameRelations.description: Number of EAC record that has been created by current EAC

numberOfResults.description: Number of search hits on the current document.

repository.description: Name of the repository holding the fonds

language.description: Language of the description of the result.
